title: Remove git-ops-agent.md from local .claude/agents/ directory
description: The local .claude/agents/git-ops-agent.md file needs to be deleted as git-ops-agent has been removed from the shared agents. Claude Code will continue to discover this agent until the file is removed and the session is restarted.
test_steps: 4. Restart Claude Code session for agent discovery to refresh
5. Verify git-ops-agent is no longer available in agent list
acceptance_criteria: No git-ops-agent in available agents after restart
Other agents still available and functional
